title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 263: Featuring Brandon Prust
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Brandon Prust. Prusty joins (44:21) to talk about his time in New York, Montreal, playing for Torts and a ton more. The boys also touch on some NHL news, including Marco Scandella’s new contract, Big Buff, and a bunch more. The guys wrap up with some movie talk along with a few words for Nova Scotia.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
